class pilotlog.importers.base_importer.BaseImporter(record)¶

A base class for importing data from a dictionary.

get_model()¶

Returns the Django model class that this importer handles.

This method should be implemented by subclasses.

process()¶

Processes the record and saves it to the database.

This method should be implemented by subclasses.

validate()¶

Validates the record.

This method should be implemented by subclasses.

class pilotlog.importers.aircraft_importer.AircraftImporter(record)¶

Importer for aircraft data.

get_model()¶

Returns the Aircraft model class.

process()¶

Processes the aircraft record and saves it to the database.

validate()¶

Validates the aircraft record.

class pilotlog.importers.airfield_importer.AirfieldImporter(record)¶

Importer for airfield data.

get_model()¶

Returns the Airfield model class.

process()¶

Processes the airfield record and saves it to the database.

validate()¶

Validates the airfield record.

class pilotlog.importers.pilot_importer.PilotImporter(record)¶

Importer for pilot data.

get_model()¶

Returns the Pilot model class.

process()¶

Processes the pilot record and saves it to the database.

validate()¶

Validates the pilot record.

class pilotlog.importers.flight_importer.FlightImporter(record)¶

Importer for flight data.

get_model()¶

Returns the Flight model class.

process()¶

Processes the flight record and saves it to the database.

validate()¶

Validates the flight record.

class pilotlog.exporters.base_exporter.BaseExporter(queryset)¶

A base class for exporting data to a file.

export(file_path)¶

Exports the queryset to a file.

This method should be implemented by subclasses.

Args:

file_path (str): The path to the output file.

class pilotlog.exporters.csv_logbook_exporter.CsvLogbookExporter(queryset)¶

Exports data to a CSV file in the logbook format.

export(file_path)¶

Exports the data to a CSV file.

Args:

file_path (str): The path to the output CSV file.

class pilotlog.management.commands.import_data.Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False, force_color=False)¶
add_arguments(parser)¶

Entry point for subclassed commands to add custom arguments.

handle(*args, **options)¶

The actual logic of the command. Subclasses must implement this method.

class pilotlog.management.commands.export_data.Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False, force_color=False)¶
add_arguments(parser)¶

Entry point for subclassed commands to add custom arguments.

handle(*args, **options)¶

The actual logic of the command. Subclasses must implement this method.
